item.title: Comment on Scale 2018 by Gary Jones
item.dc:creator: Gary Jones

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Antonio Hurtado de Mendoza
item.dc:creator: Antonio Hurtado de Mendoza
item.description: Think not because you are now wed. That all your courtship's at an end.
item.content:encoded: Think not because you are now wed. That all your courtship’s at an end.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Thomas Lovell Beddoes
item.dc:creator: Thomas Lovell Beddoes
item.description: Tell me how many beads there are In a silver chain Of evening rain, Unravelled from the tumbling main, And threading the eye of a yellow star: - So many times do I love again.
item.content:encoded: Tell me how many beads there are In a silver chain Of evening rain, Unravelled from the tumbling main, And threading the eye of a yellow star: – So many times do I love again.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Maxwell Anderson
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Anderson
item.description: If two stand shoulder to shoulder against the gods, Happy together, the gods themselves are helpless Against them while they stand so.
item.content:encoded: If two stand shoulder to shoulder against the gods, Happy together, the gods themselves are helpless Against them while they stand so.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Michael Leunig
item.dc:creator: Michael Leunig
item.description: Love one another and you will be happy. It's as simple and as difficult as that.
item.content:encoded: Love one another and you will be happy. It’s as simple and as difficult as that.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: ove is like playing the piano. First you must learn to play by the rules, then you must forget the rules and play from your heart.
item.content:encoded:
ove is like playing the piano.
First you must learn to play by the rules,
then you must forget the rules and play from your heart.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Ralph Block
item.dc:creator: Ralph Block
item.description: You're nothing short of my everything.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by George Sands
item.dc:creator: George Sands
item.description: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
item.content:encoded:
There is only one happiness in life,
to love and be loved.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Socrates
item.dc:creator: Socrates
item.description: My advice to you is get married: if you find a good wife you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher.
item.content:encoded: My advice to you is get married: if you find a good wife you’ll be happy; if not, you’ll become a philosopher.

item.title: Comment on Reviews by Ellie Goulding
item.dc:creator: Ellie Goulding
item.description: I met Prince William at a musical festival and he let me know he was a fan of my music. But the invitation to sing at his wedding reception came completely out of the blue. The fact that Kate and William knew the words to my songs was very touching...
item.content:encoded: I met Prince William at a musical festival and he let me know he was a fan of my music. But the invitation to sing at his wedding reception came completely out of the blue. The fact that Kate and William knew the words to my songs was very touching…
